thread.title: US Airways employee dies in Phoenix
thread.title_full: US Airways employee dies in Phoenix

author: KPNX-TV, Phoenix
title: US Airways employee dies in Phoenix
text:
A US Airways employee was killed July 15, 2015, in a workplace stabbing at the airline's Phoenix flight-simulator facility. (Photo: Nick Oza, The Arizona Republic)
2 CONNECT 33 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE PHOENIX â€” Airport operations were not affected Wednesday after two technicians at a US Airways facility near Sky Harbor International Airport got into an argument that led to a fatal stabbing .
One of the flight-simulator technicians stabbed the other with a sharp object, Phoenix police Sgt. Vince Lewis said. The victim was transported to a local hospital, and he later died.
Police have detained the employee accused in the stabbing, and Lewis said he is cooperating with authorities.
No details on the disagreement were released. No names have been released in the incident, and no charges have been filed at the moment.
The stabbing occurred in an office hallway, not in the flight simulator area of the airline's facility, which is located separately from the airport's passenger terminals, Lewis said.
Contributing: The Arizona Republic
